passD1: Passwords must contain at least eight

des1: By clicking “Sign up”, you agree to our , privacy policy and cookie policy
aboutD3: Unlock new privileges like voting and commenting
aboutD4: Save your favorite tags, filters, and jobs
aboutD6: Collaborate and share knowledge with a private group for
aboutD7: Get Stack Overflow for Teams free for up to 50 users.
title: Title
titleD: Be specific and imagine you’re asking a question to another person
titlePh: e.g. Is there an R function for finding the index of an element in a vector?
bodyD: Include all the information someone would need to answer your question
tagsD: Add up to 5 tags to describe what your question is about
tagsD1: A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions.
tagsD2: Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
javascriptD: For questions regarding programming in ECMAScript (JavaScript/JS) and its various dialects/implementations (excluding ActionScript). Please include all relevant tags on your question.
pythonD: Python is a multi-paradigm, dynamically typed, multipurpose programming language. It is designed to be quick to learn, understand, and use, and enforces a clean and uniform syntax.
c#D: C# (pronounced 'see sharp') is a high level, statically typed, multi-paradigm programming language developed by Microsoft.
javaD: Java is a high-level object oriented programming language. Use this tag when you're having problems using or understanding the language itself.
phpD: PHP is a widely used, open source, general-purpose, multi-paradigm, dynamically typed and interpreted scripting language originally designed for server-side web development.
htmlD: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the markup language for creating web pages and other information to be displayed in a web browser.
androidD: Android is Google's mobile operating system, used for programming or developing digital devices (Smartphones, Tablets, Automobiles, TVs, Wear, Glass, IoT).
cssD: CSS is a representation style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of HTML, XML documents and SVG elements including colors, layout, fonts, and animations.
reactjsD: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It uses a declarative, component-based paradigm and aims to be both efficient and flexible.
nodejsD: Node.js is an event-based, non-blocking, asynchronous I/O runtime that uses Google's V8 JavaScript engine and libuv library.
wTagsD: Add tags separated by a space [' ']
roomDesc: Create a Unique Room or Ask Room ID from Friend.
fileDesc: Make Sure you get a 'Uploaded Successfully' alert before submiting, after uploading any file.
goHDesc: Please Refresh the page if meeting doesn't appear.
expoACDesc: Offers you to question more 150 times in our Stack Overflow Clone.
expoPRDesc: Offers you to question more 30 times in our Stack Overflow Clone.
forgotPassDesc: An Email with reset password will be sent to you.
pasWarn: Enter a valid password to reset.
